summary: World of Warcraft (WoW) is a popular online fantasy game where players create characters and explore the world of Azeroth. Released in 2004, it has had many expansion packs, adding new content over the years. Players can fight monsters, complete quests, and interact with others or NPCs. The game is about making your character stronger by leveling up and getting better gear. WoW was a huge success, with millions of players, and is still played today, even getting a classic version in 2019.
title: World of Warcraft
